availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George Lewis Gothard (Hamilton Co., TN farmer (signed petition in Caldwell County))

body.p: Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Son of James Gothard and Susan Gothard. Resident in Hamilton County, Tennessee, in 1850. Farmer in Kentucky in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Hamilton County, District 27, p. 390B.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War) NARA RG 110, Second District of Kentucky, KY, p. 33.
"George Lewis Gothard (1837-1924)," Find A Grave, Memorial #83744961, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/83744961 (accessed July 20, 2021).
